The `model_parameters()` function can also be used to calculate **standardized**
model parameters via the `standardize`-argument.

To read more about how this works, read the following vignette from `effectsize`
package, from whence this functionality comes:
<https://easystats.github.io/effectsize/articles/standardize_parameters.html>
